text: Angela Merkel rebuffed Trump invite to attend G-7 summit, which he’s keen to portray as a return to normalcy from upheaval of coronavirus crisis. “Considering the overall pandemic situation, she cannot agree to a journey to Washington," her spokesman said. https://t.co/PyfvMiwue4
